name: Comfort Zone (Charlotte Narwhal, Seraphia)
description:
This game is all about helping your fellow game developers, by fetching the items they want and sometimes they might want to be taken to the exercise area or to the hammocks! 

Keep productivity as high as you can by getting the devs to relax when they need it and in doing so, create a better work atmosphere for your devs.

Left Click: Pick up/place items, interact with devs.       Scroll: Change inventory item.

Good Luck!
